title: How does ProtonVPN Plus work with Netflix? - Quora

response.answer_text: ProtonVPN does work with Netflix. Many VPN providers will mark specific servers for use with streaming services, but ProtonVPN doesn't, so it's not immediately obvious which servers to use. If you try a random server, chances are you won't have much luck. Thanks for Reading Upvote if you agree with my answer. Follow me if you like my answer. ~Aman
